inputs.name: ipaPath
inputs.label: IPA
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the ipa file you want to resign.

inputs.name: entitlementsPath
inputs.label: Entitlements
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional relative path from the repo root to the entitlements file to use.

inputs.name: signMethod
inputs.label: Sign Using
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates the method used to sign.

inputs.name: signFileP12Path
inputs.label: P12 Certificate File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to a PKCS12 formatted p12 certificate file containing a signing certificate to be used to resign the ipa.

inputs.name: signFileP12Password
inputs.label: P12 Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to P12 Certificate File if specified. Use a Build Variable to encrypt.

inputs.name: signIdIdentity
inputs.label: Signing Identity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Signing identity name or uuid that should be used to resign the ipa. You may need to select Unlock Default Keychain if you use this option.

inputs.name: signIdUnlockKeychain
inputs.label: Unlock Default Keychain
inputs.helpMarkDown: Resolve "User interaction is not allowed" errors by unlocking the default keychain.

inputs.name: signIdKeychainPassword
inputs.label: Default Keychain Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to unlock the default keychain when this option is set.

inputs.name: provisionMethod
inputs.label: Provision Using
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates the method used to provision.

inputs.name: provFileProfilePath
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to file containing provisioning profile to be used to resign the ipa.

inputs.name: provFileRemoveProfile
inputs.label: Remove Profile After Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies that the contents of the Provisioning Profile file should be removed from the build agent after the resign is complete. **Only check if you are running one agent per user.**

inputs.name: provIdProfileUuid
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile UUID
inputs.helpMarkDown: UUID of an installed provisioning profile to be used to resign the ipa. Expects that the provisioning profile is installed in '~/Library/MobileDevice/Provisioning Profiles'.

inputs.name: sighResignArgs
inputs.label: Sigh Resign Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional fastlane Sigh Resign arguments that should be used to resign.

inputs.name: cwdPath
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory for signing. Defaults to the root of the repository.

inputs.name: installFastlane
inputs.label: Install fastlane
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to install a version of the fastlane tools.  Uncheck if your build machine already has the version of fastlane to use.

inputs.name: fastlaneToolsVersion
inputs.label: fastlane Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose to install either the lastest version of fastlane or a specific version.

inputs.name: fastlaneToolsSpecificVersion
inputs.label: fastlane Specific Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the version of fastlane to install (e.g., 2.15.1).  If a specific version of fastlane is installed, all previously installed versions will be uninstalled beforehand.

messages.DarwinOnly: The Ipa Resign task can only run on a Mac computer.
messages.UninstallFastlaneFailed: There were errors when trying to uninstall fastlane. Review the error and if required add a script to your pipeline to cleanly uninstall fastlane prior to running this task. Uninstall error: %s
messages.FailedTemporaryKeyDeletion: Failed to delete temporary keychain created during the resign process. %s
messages.FailedProvisioningProfileDeletion: Failed to delete the provisioning profile %s
messages.NoMatchingFileWithSearchPattern: No matching file was found with search pattern: %s
messages.MultipleFilesFound: Multiple matching files were found with search pattern: %s. The pattern must match exactly one file.
messages.P12FilePathNotAPath: Path provided for P12 file is not a path: %s
messages.ProvisionFilePathNotAPath: Path provided for provisioning profile is not a path: %s
